dialog.text: Heh heh heh. Did you ever find a use for that key, or is it still burning a hole in your pocket? Heh heh heh.
Heh heh heh. I've got a rare key I'm willing to sell you. It's yours for just... 10000 senines! Looks like you don't have enough. Heh heh heh.
Heh heh heh. I've got a rare key I'm willing to sell you. It's yours for just... 10000 senines! Heh heh heh.

prompt.next_dialog: Nice doing business with you. What? I have no idea what it unlocks. Heh heh heh.
Your loss. I might have sold it to someone else when you come asking me again. Heh heh heh.

ai_sprite.name: woman2
ai_sprite.dialog: Get away from me, you brute!

ai_sprite.name: old_woman
ai_sprite.dialog: Thank you for protecting our city.

dialog.text: I am concerned there will always be yet another conflict awaiting our people.
I hear that Ammoron, the brother of Amalickiah, has taken his place as king of the Lamanites and continues to occupy our cities. Will this war never end?
